basic_data.Description: IGF::OT::IGF  NASA RESEARCH ANNOUNCEMENT AWARD FOR WIDE FIELD INFRARED SURVEY TELESCOPE (WFIRST).   UNDER THIS CONTRACT, THE CONTRACTOR SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE FOLLOWING TASKS IN SUPPORT OF WFIRST FORMULATION AND IMPLEMENTATION: DEVELOPMENT OF SCIENTIFIC PERFORMANCE REQUIREMENTS RELATED TO TYPE IA SUPERNOVAE, IN COLLABORATION WITH THE WIDEFIELD ADJUTANT SCIENTIST (WAS), CONTRIBUTE TO THE DESIGN OF OVERALL OBSERVATIONAL STRATEGY CONCEPT, DEVELOPMENT OF SCIENCE DATA ANALYSIS TECHNIQUES, DEVELOPMENT OF GROUND AND SPACE CALIBRATION REQUIREMENTS, DEVELOPMENT OF COMPLETE PLANS FOR ALL ASPECTS OF SCIENCE SIMULATIONS, PRECURSOR OBSERVATIONS, GROUND CALIBRATION, OBSERVATIONAL NEEDS, DATA PROCESSING, ANCILLARY DATA COLLECTION/INCORPORATION, ANALYSIS, DISSEMINATION AND DOCUMENTATION OF THE PROPOSED SCIENCE INVESTIGATION.  THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE INPUT PERTAINING TO SCIENCE OPERATIONS CONCEPTS. THIS INCLUDES SURVEY DESIGN, OBSERVATION AND DATA ACQUISITION STRATEGIES, CALIBRATION APPROACHES, USE OF SUPPORTING DATA FROM OTHER FACILITIES, AND ANY OTHER ACTIVITIES ASSOCIATED WITH OBTAINING THE NECESSARY SCIENCE DATA.  THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE PLANS FOR DEVELOPING STRATEGIES FOR MISSION VERIFICATION AND VALIDATION. THIS INCLUDES GENERATION OF SIMULATED DATA TO TEST DATA ANALYSIS PIPELINES, SIMULATING SURVEY DATASETS TO VERIFY THAT PROPOSED OBSERVING STRATEGIES WILL YIELD DATA ADEQUATE TO MEET MISSION REQUIREMENTS AND VALIDATE THE MISSION DESIGN.  THE CONTRACTOR SHALL DEVELOP PRELIMINARY CONCEPTS FOR DATA PROCESSING AND ARCHIVAL PRODUCTS AND CAPABILITIES, AND TO ASSIST IN DEVELOPMENT OF IMPLEMENTATION PLANS FOR DATA PROCESSING. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PARTICIPATE IN PUBLIC AND COMMUNITY OUTREACH ACTIVITIES. THE CONTRACTOR WILL ALSO PROVIDE QUARTERLY UPDATES TO THE RELEVANT SECTIONS TO THE SRD, SCIENCE OPERATIONS CONCEPTS, THE MISSION VERIFICATION AND VALIDATION APPROACHES, AND DATA PROCESSING AND ARCHIVING PLANS.  THE PRINCIPAL INVESTIGATOR NAMED IN THE PROPOSAL SUBMISSION SHALL RETAIN FULL RESPONSIBILITY AND AUTHORITY TO MANAGE AND ADMINISTER ALL PHASES OF THE WORK SPECIFIED BY THE CONTRACT AND ENSURE THAT ALL OBJECTIVES ARE ACCOMPLISHED WITHIN SCHEDULE AND COST CONSTRAINTS.  THE PI SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE, AT THE REQUEST OF THE NASA/GSFC COR, ANY DATASET, ANALYSIS TOOL, SIMULATED DATA PRODUCTS, OR SOFTWARE CODE THAT WAS DEVELOPED AS A PART OF THE RESEARCH OR WORK CONDUCTED UNDER THIS CONTRACT. MONTHLY STATUS REVIEWS SHALL BE A SUMMARY PRESENTATION OF THE PERIOD'S PROGRESS, PROBLEM AREAS, AND ACTIVITIES ON-GOING AND PLANNED. THESE REVIEWS ARE TO BE HELD THE LAST WEEK OF EACH MONTH AND CONDUCTED VIA TELECOM; BRIEF WRITTEN REPORTS MAY BE PROVIDED IN LIEU OF A TELECOM.

NAICS.description: RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT IN THE PHYSICAL, ENGINEERING, AND LIFE SCIENCES (EXCEPT BIOTECHNOLOGY)
